snippet: Thousands of grieving Guatemalans demanded justice at the funerals for six people slain during a protest on Thursday over electrical power prices and educational policies in a rural area.
abstract: Thousands of grieving Guatemalans demand justice for six people slain by security forces during protest over electrical power prices and educational policies.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of grieving Guatemalans demanded justice at the funerals for six people slain during a protest on Thursday over electrical power prices and educational policies in a rural area.
